New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [720pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Daughters of Khaine) [720pts]

    • Leader [480pts]

      • Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine [480pts]

        Categories: AELF, HERO, WIZARD, MORATHI, HIGH ORACLE OF KHAINE, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, MORATHI, THE SHADOW QUEEN, MONSTER

        Command Trait: Worship Through Bloodshed, Damage Table: WoundTable0, WoundTable1, WoundTable2, WoundTable3, WoundTable4, WoundTable5, Magic: Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine, Morathi, The Shadow Queen, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Arnzipal’s Black Horror, Mystic Shield, Unit: Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine, Morathi, The Shadow Queen, Unit Abilities: Enchanting Beauty, Fly, Gaze of Morathi, Monstrous Revelation, Monstrous Transformation, Sorceress Supreme, The Iron Heart of Khaine, The Truth Revealed, Weapon: Bladed Wings, Crown of Serpents, Envenomed Tail, Gaze of Morathi, Heartrender (Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine), Heartrender (Morathi, The Shadow Queen)


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Worship Through Bloodshed If Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine is your general, you can use this ability. If you do, pick up to 2 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units within 14" of Morathi (you cannot choose Morathi herself). Those units can immediately shoot as if it were the shooting phase. Alternatively, if either unit is within 3" of an enemy unit, it can instead be chosen to pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase. The same unit cannot be picked to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. Battletome: DoK Errata, June 2018
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        WoundTable0 Wounds SufferedMoveHeartrenderEnvenomed Tail
        WoundTable1 0-214"66
        WoundTable2 3-412"5D6
        WoundTable3 5-710"4D6
        WoundTable4 8-98"3D3
        WoundTable5 10+6"2D3
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine 3/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Arnzipal's Black Horror
        Morathi, The Shadow Queen 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Arnzipal's Black Horror
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Arnzipal’s Black Horror 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them, and roll a dice. On a 1 that unit suffers a mortal wound, on a 2 or 3 it suffers D3 mortal wounds, and on a 4+ it suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine 6"694+
        Morathi, The Shadow Queen *1294+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Enchanting Beauty Subtract 1 from the hit rolls of attacks that target Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Gaze of Morathi If a target is hit by the Gaze of Morathi, pick a model in the target unit and roll a dice. If the result exceeds that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Monstrous Revelation Morathi’s Shadow Queen model is not set up on the battlefield at the start of the battle. Instead, it is set up when Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine uses the Monstrous Transformation or The Truth Revealed ability (pg 76). When Morathi transforms, her High Oracle of Khaine model is removed from the battlefield and her Shadow Queen model is set up on the spot where she was standing before her transformation. Morathi’s Shadow Queen model can only be set up within 3" of an enemy unit if her High Oracle of Khaine model was within 3" of that unit before her transformation. If there is insufficient room to place Morathi exactly where she was standing before her transformation, simply place the model as close as possible to that spot where there is sufficient room. If, after her Shadow Queen model has been set up, Morathi is more than 14" away from the spot where she was standing before her transformation, she cannot move in the following movement phase. Any wounds allocated to Morathi in her High Oracle of Khaine form prior to her transformation are carried over to her Shadow Queen form and then doubled. For example, if 3 wounds had been allocated to Morathi in her High Oracle of Khaine form before she transformed, she would be set up in her Shadow Queen form with 6 wounds already allocated to her. Note that Morathi cannot transform back to her former aspect during the battle – once in her Shadow Queen form, she stays that way for the remainder of the battle. If Morathi was your general in her High Oracle of Khaine form, she remains your general in her Shadow Queen form but she loses the Worship Through Bloodshed command ability. Also note that Morathi in her Shadow Queen form loses the Sorceress Supreme and Enchanted Beauty abilities that she has in her High Oracle of Khaine form (pg 76), and she can attempt to cast and unbind fewer spells in her Shadow Queen form.
        Monstrous Transformation At the start of your hero phase, Morathi can transform into her monstrous aspect. See the Morathi, the Shadow Queen warscroll (pg 77) for a description of how Morathi transforms.
        Sorceress Supreme Add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls made for Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine. In addition, double the range of spells she attempts to cast.
        The Iron Heart of Khaine Morathi cannot be healed, but no more than 3 wounds can be allocated to her in any one turn. Any additional wounds and/or mortal wounds allocated to her in the same turn are negated and have no effect.
        The Truth Revealed If Morathi is wounded, there is a chance she will no longer be able to contain her wrath and will transform into her monstrous aspect. Roll a dice at the start of your hero phase. If the result is equal to or less than the number of wounds currently allocated to Morathi, she transforms as described on the Morathi, the Shadow Queen warscroll (pg 77).
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bladed Wings Melee2"3+3+-11
        Crown of Serpents Melee1"53+3+-1
        Envenomed Tail Melee3"13+3+-2*
        Gaze of Morathi Missile6"12+***
        Heartrender (Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine) Melee2"33+3+-1D3
        Heartrender (Morathi, The Shadow Queen) Melee2"*3+3+-23

    • Battleline [120pts]

      • Sisters of Slaughter [120pts]

        Selections: 10 Sisters of Slaughter [120pts]

        Categories: AELF, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, SISTERS OF SLAUGHTER, Battleline

        Unit: Sisters of Slaughter, Unit Abilities: Dance of Death, Handmaiden, Weapon: Barbed Whip


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Sisters of Slaughter 6"176+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Dance of Death Sisters of Slaughter can be chosen to pile in and attack in the combat phase if they are within 6" of an enemy, and can move up to 6" when they pile in.
        Handmaiden The leader of this unit is a Handmaiden. Add 1 to hit rolls for a Handmaiden.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Barbed Whip Melee2"23+4+-1

    • Battalion [120pts]

      • Battalion: Cauldron Guard [120pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Frenzied Devotees


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Frenzied Devotees Add 1 to run and charge rolls made for units from this battalion.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Blood Rites, Fanatical Faith


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges. 1. Quickening Bloodlust: Re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit. 2. Headlong Fury: Re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit. 3. Zealot's Rage: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, if this unit is an AVATAR OF KHAINE, it always counts as being Animated (see the model’s warscroll). 4. Slaughterer's Strength: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit. 5+ Unquenchable Fervour: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, you do not need to take battleshock tests for this unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50
        Fanatical Faith Roll a dice each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE model. On a 6+ the wound is negated. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

          Selections: Hagg Nar

          Rules: COMMAND TRAIT, WARSCROLL BATTALIONS

          Battle Trait: Blood Rites, Daughters of the First Temple, Fanatical Faith


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges. 1. Quickening Bloodlust: Re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit. 2. Headlong Fury: Re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit. 3. Zealot's Rage: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, if this unit is an AVATAR OF KHAINE, it always counts as being Animated (see the model’s warscroll). 4. Slaughterer's Strength: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit. 5+ Unquenchable Fervour: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, you do not need to take battleshock tests for this unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50
        Daughters of the First Temple Whilst a Hagg Nar unit is benefitting from the Zealot’s Rage ability from the Blood Rites battle trait (pg 50), you can re-roll all failed hit rolls for the unit instead of only re-rolling hit rolls of 1.
        Fanatical Faith Roll a dice each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE model. On a 6+ the wound is negated. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

          Selections: Draichi Ganeth

          Rules: ARTEFACT OF POWER, WARSCROLL BATTALIONS

          Battle Trait: Bladed Killers, Blood Rites, Fanatical Faith


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Bladed Killers Add 1 to hit rolls for Draichi Ganeth units in the combat phase if they charged in the same turn.
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges. 1. Quickening Bloodlust: Re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit. 2. Headlong Fury: Re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit. 3. Zealot's Rage: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, if this unit is an AVATAR OF KHAINE, it always counts as being Animated (see the model’s warscroll). 4. Slaughterer's Strength: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit. 5+ Unquenchable Fervour: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, you do not need to take battleshock tests for this unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50

        • Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

          Selections: The Kraith

          Rules: ARTEFACT OF POWER, WARSCROLL BATTALIONS

        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges. 1. Quickening Bloodlust: Re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit. 2. Headlong Fury: Re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit. 3. Zealot's Rage: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. Slaughterer's Strength: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit. 5+ Unquenchable Fervour: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, you do not need to take battleshock tests for this unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50
        Disciples of Slaughter Roll a dice after a Kraith unit has fought in the combat phase if there are any enemy units within 3" of it. On a 6, you can pile in and attack with that unit for a second time.
        Fanatical Faith Roll a dice each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE model. On a 6+ the wound is negated. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

Selection Rules

ARTEFACT OF POWER: If your army includes any Draichi Ganeth SLAUGHTER QUEENS, one must have The Darksword artefact of power. ()

COMMAND TRAIT: A Khailebron general must have the Mistress of Illusion command trait. ()

WARSCROLL BATTALIONS: A Draichi Ganeth Slaughter Troupe battalion (pg 72) can also include up to 2 units of Witch Aelves. ()
